overview:
## Discussion

The system sets this key on [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryTypeIdentifier/lowCardioFitnessEvent] samples. It contains the value of the VO2 max measurement that triggered the event. # HKMetadataKeyVO2MaxValue

**Global Variable**

The maximum oxygen consumption rate during exercise of increasing intensity.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyVO2MaxValue: String
```

## Discussion

The system sets this key on [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryTypeIdentifier/lowCardioFitnessEvent] samples. It contains the value of the VO2 max measurement that triggered the event. The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] object with a unit of `ml/kg/min`. For more information on working with complex units, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/unitMultiplied(by:)], [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/unitDivided(by:)], and [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/init(from:)-9qont].

## Cardio Fitness Keys

- **HKMetadataKeyLowCardioFitnessEventThreshold**: The VO2 max threshold used to categorize low-level cardio fitness events.
